publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1423 Sarah Boyack: Draft Undertaking by the Scottish Ministers under Section 2 (1) of the Highlands and Islands Shipping Services Act 1960-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Undertaking by the Scottish Ministers under section 2(1) of the Highlands and Islands Shipping Services Act 1960 be approved.

S1M-1423 Sarah Boyack: Draft Undertaking by the Scottish Ministers under Section 2 (1) of the Highlands and Islands Shipping Services Act 1960-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Undertaking by the Scottish Ministers under section 2(1) of the Highlands and Islands Shipping Services Act 1960 be approved.
